text:
BSI Forum #ECR rep @drloutopping from @UniofOxford has completed the training to be a Volunteer Patient Advocate with @stjohnambulance #StJohnPeople 

Here, she shares her thoughts on the benefits of engaging with people receiving the #COVID19 #vaccine 👉https://t.co/butBYHRLty https://t.co/5N5nwEiDV6
